original: Dhvajāgrakeyurādhāraṇī
analyzed: dhvaja agra keyuḥ ādhāraṇī
translated: The Dhāraṇī of Dhvajagrapāṇi

original: dhvajāgrakeyurā dhāraṇī
analyzed: dhvaja agra keyurā dhāraṇī
translated: The Dhāraṇī of Dhvajagrapāṇi

original: namo ratna trayāya /
analyzed: namaḥ ratna trayāya
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels.

original: namo bhagavate dhvajāgra rājāya tathāgatāya arhate samyak sambuddhāya tadyathā /
analyzed: namaḥ bhagavate dhvajāgra rājāya tathāgatāya arhate samyak sambuddhāya tat yathā
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One, Dhvajagrapati. Thus:

original: jaya jaya vijaya vijaya jayavāhinisam gari prabhañjani prabhañjani sarva śatruṇām
analyzed: jaya jaya vijaya vijaya jayavāhinisam gari prabhañjani prabhañjani sarva śatruṇām
translated: Victory, victory, be victorious, be victorious, O you who carry victory, O you who crush the pride, O you who crush all enemies,

original: jambhaya jambhaya stambhaya stambhaya mohaya mohaya bhagavati jayavāhini mātha mātha
analyzed: jambhaya jambhaya stambhaya stambhaya mohaya mohaya bhagavati jaya vāhini mātha mātha
translated: Paralyze, paralyze, stupefy, stupefy, O Blessed One, O you who carry victory, crush, crush,

original: pramātha pramātha grasa grasa hasa hasa huṃ huṃ lambodari trinetre caturmukhe caturvaktre
analyzed: pramātha pramātha grasa grasa hasa hasa hum hum lambodari trinetre caturmukhe caturvaktre
translated: Completely crush, swallow, swallow, laugh, laugh, huṃ huṃ, O you with a pendulous belly, O you with three eyes, O you with four faces, O you with four mouths,

original: catur daṃṣṭre catur bhuje asi musala khaḍga triśūla vajra dhāraṇīrakṣa rakṣa mām /
analyzed: catur daṃṣṭre catur bhuje asi musala khaḍga triśūla vajra dhāraṇī rakṣa rakṣa mām
translated: O you with four fangs, O you with four arms, O you who hold a sword, a mace, a scimitar, a trident, and a vajra, protect, protect me.

original: bhagavati hana hana daha daha paca paca mātha mātha pramātha pramātha huṃ huṃ phaṭphaṭbhañja bhañja sarva śatrūṇām /
analyzed: bhagavati hana hana daha daha paca paca mātha mātha pramātha pramātha hum hum phaṭ phaṭ bhañja bhañja sarva śatrūṇām
translated: O Blessed One, strike, strike, burn, burn, cook, cook, crush, crush, completely crush, huṃ huṃ, phaṭ phaṭ, break, break all enemies.

original: dhvajāgra keyure tisṭhat tisṭhat triṭa ulkā dhāraṇi trailokyanātha vidhvaṃśaya
analyzed: dhvaja agra keyure tisṭhat tisṭhat triṭaḥ ulkā dhāraṇi trailokya nātha vidhvaṃśaya
translated: O Dhvajagrapāṇi, remain, remain, O you who hold the burning torch, O Lord of the Three Worlds, destroy,

original: para sainya rakṣa rakṣa māṃ cala cala cili cili culu culu kala kala kili kili kulu kulu muncaṭṭa hāsaya vidhvaṃśaya parasainya bhramaya /
analyzed: para sainya rakṣa rakṣa mām cala cala cili cili culu culu kala kala kili kili kulu kulu muncaṭṭa hāsaya vidhvaṃśaya para sainya bhramaya
translated: Protect my army, protect me, move, move, chil-chil, culu-culu, kal-kal, kili-kili, kul-kul, release, make laugh, destroy the enemy army, confuse them.

original: buddha satyena dharma satyena saṃgha satyena satya vādināṃ satyena buddha satyāmatikrama dharma satyāṃ atikrama saṃgha satyāṃ atikrama satya
analyzed: buddha satyena dharma satyena saṃgha satyena satya vādinām satyena buddha satyām atikrama dharma satyām atikrama saṃgha satyām atikrama satya
translated: By the truth of the Buddha, the truth of the Dharma, the truth of the Sangha, by the truth of those who speak the truth, by the truth of the Buddha, transgress the truth of the Dharma, transgress the truth of the Sangha, transgress the truth

original: vādinaṃ satyamatikrama /
analyzed: vādinam satyam atikrama
translated: of those who speak the truth.

original: lambodare kuṭṭa kuṭṭa kuṭṭya kuṭṭya rudra mānaya biṣṇu mānaya candra sūrya mānaya
analyzed: lambodare kuṭṭa kuṭṭa kuṭṭya kuṭṭya rudra mānaya biṣṇu mānaya candra sūrya mānaya
translated: O you with a large belly, strike, strike, strike, bring Rudra, bring Vishnu, bring Chandra and Surya,

original: trailokya adhipatya mānaya sarva devo mānaya sarva yakṣa rākṣasa gandharva kinnara
analyzed: trailokya adhipatya mānaya sarva devaḥ mānaya sarva yakṣa rākṣasa gandharva kinnara
translated: bring the lord of the three worlds, bring all gods, bring all Yakshas, Rakshasas, Gandharvas, Kinnaras,

original: mahoraga mānaya vidhvamsaya mama sarva śatru vaḥ rangha rangha ranghāpaya ranghāpaya
analyzed: mahoraga mānaya vidhvamsaya mama sarva śatru vaḥ rangha rangha ranghāpaya ranghāpaya
translated: and great serpents, destroy all my enemies, strike, strike, make them strike, make them strike.

original: jvala jvala puṣpa mālini liḍhi liḍhi triṭa triṭa bhṛkuti mukhaḥ parasainya kurucchedana
analyzed: jvala jvala puṣpa mālini liḍhi liḍhi para sainya kuru chedana
translated: Blaze, blaze, O you adorned with flower garlands, lick, lick, grind, grind, with a frowning face, make the enemy army perish.

original: karaṇha ha hi hi hu hu he he riṇi riṇi riṇā māte jayantu dhvaje /
analyzed: ha hi hi hu hu he he riṇi riṇi riṇā māte jayantu dhvaje
translated: Karna hi hi hi hu hu he he rini rini rina mate jayantu dhwaje.

original: buddhāvalokite rakṣa rakṣa mama bhagavatāvalokite svāhā /
analyzed: buddha avalokite rakṣa rakṣa mama bhagavatā avalokite svāhā
translated: Buddha avalokite raksha raksham mama bhagavata avalokite svaha.

original: guṇa rāja prabhāse svāhā /
analyzed: guṇa rāja prabhāse svāhā
translated: Gunaraja prabhase svaha.

original: suryārka vimale svāhā /
analyzed: surya arka vimale svāhā
translated: Suryarka vimal svaha.

original: sarva graha nakṣatra dā me karaṇa svāhā /
analyzed: sarva graha nakṣatra dā me karaṇa svāhā
translated: Sarva graha nakshatra dame karana svaha.
